org.dataconservancy.packaging.gui.presenter

Interface PackageGenerationPresenter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Presenter
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    PackageGenerationPresenterImpl

    public interface PackageGenerationPresenter
extends Presenter
    Handles the screen related to generating a package. Allows the user to select packaging options and an output directory to save to.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setPackageGenerationParametersBuilder(PackageGenerationParametersBuilder packageParamsBuilder)
      Sets the package parameters builder that will be used for deserializing package parameters from a file.
      void setPackageGenerationService(PackageGenerationService packageGenerationService)
      Sets the service that will be used for generating a package from the previously created package description, and the defined package parameters.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.dataconservancy.packaging.gui.presenter.Presenter

        clear, display, getController, setController, setInternalProperties

    • Method Detail

      • setPackageGenerationService

        void setPackageGenerationService(PackageGenerationService packageGenerationService)
        Sets the service that will be used for generating a package from the previously created package description, and the defined package parameters.
        Parameters:
        packageGenerationService - the PackageGenerationService

      • setPackageGenerationParametersBuilder

        void setPackageGenerationParametersBuilder(PackageGenerationParametersBuilder packageParamsBuilder)
        Sets the package parameters builder that will be used for deserializing package parameters from a file. Note currently this is not used.
        Parameters:
        packageParamsBuilder - the PackageGenerationParametersBuilder
